modName: The Lost Heirloom Of Barry Brothelpots
summary: A quest in witch you try to retrieve a lost necklace from a dungeon with lots of custom items ect
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a NPC called Barry Brothelpots to the Riften Bee And Barb. He gives you a quest in witch you have to retrieve a lost heirloom from a near by dungeon called Shimigami (across the river from RiverWood). There is Custom weapons and armor (unfortunately using the vanilla textures) as well as a 500 gold reward when you complete the quest.
------------------
Fell free to make a video about this mod and put it on youtube. Please contact me with the video link if you do so i can ad it to this mod page.
------------------
INSTALL:
1. Extract BarryBrothelpots1.1
2. Open were you installed skyrim.
3. Open the data folder
4. Go to were you extracted BarryBrothelpots1.1 and go into the first folder named Barry
6. Drag the contents of bary into the data folder 
7. Lunch skyrim and click on the datafiles button then tick the box named shimigami.esp
8. PLAY
------------------
PLEASE Report any bugs in the comments or email me at pcgames24@gmail.com
------------------
Fixed 
Ver 1.1
1. The name when saving inside the Tomb
2. Armor having the same enchantment
